title: 35 of the Coolest & Most Popular Content Warning Face Designs to Try

steps.title: Interact with the TV.
steps.content: Interact with the TV. The TV can be found on the second floor of your house, on the wall near the suit station. To interact with the TV, press E .

steps.title: Delete the current face design.
steps.content: Delete the current face design. You can do this by pressing Backspace .

steps.title: Enter a new face design.
steps.content: Enter a new face design. Your design can be up to three characters long. You can either type a new design with your keyboard, or you can copy and paste [1] X Research source a design from somewhere else (like our list of popular faces below!)

steps.title: Change your design's orientation and size.
steps.content: Change your design's orientation and size. To do this, use the buttons on the right-hand side of the TV screen. The arrows will rotate your design 90 degrees clockwise or counterclockwise, and the plus and minus symbols will change the design's size.

steps.title: Choose a face color.
steps.content: Choose a face color. Use the bubbles on the left-hand side of the TV screen to pick one of seven colors for your face: yellow, orange, red, pink, blue, mint, and green.

steps.title: Click Apply to save your design.
steps.content: Click Apply to save your design. You can return to the TV anytime to change your face design, as long as you're inside your house.
